name: Date Quest
description:
Before you go on the date you compete against an opponent who wants to reach it before you. Each of the five locations has a different environment with different extras and per run you get a new, randomly generated level.

Successfully complete the dates by clicking on symbols that have to do with love, like hearts, before the time is up.

If you fail, you have to finish a minigame to continue. Each world has a different minigame.

Collect coins on the way to the dates to get upgrades that will let you advance faster and easier.
